author: wn.com
title: RSF condemns Croatian police violence against foreign journalists (RSF - Reporters sans frontières)
text: ( Source : RSF - Reporters sans frontières ) An Agence France-Presse photographer and a Reuters cameraman were beaten up by Croatian police and their equipment was seized yesterday while they were covering the refugee crisis at the Serbian
